mapper.insert: insert into course (course_ID, name, teacher_ID, description, attend_percentage, project_percentage,is_active) values (#{course_ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{teacher_ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{attend_percentage}, #{project_percentage}, #{is_active} )
mapper.select: SELECT course_ID,course_name,teacher_ID,teacher_name,is_student FROM (SELECT course_ID,is_student FROM takecourse WHERE student_ID = #{student_ID}) as a NATURAL JOIN (SELECT course_ID,course.name as course_name,course.teacher_ID as teacher_ID,teacher.name as teacher_name FROM course LEFT JOIN teacher on course.teacher_ID = teacher.teacher_ID WHERE is_active = #{is_active}) as b
